AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: hidden in the tractor-trailer, discovered at the immigration checkpoint stop and testified against Ramon De La Cruz
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: alleged co-conspirator and defendant in the conspiracy case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant in the conspiracy case, accused of transporting aliens for commercial advantage or private financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: individual who arranged to pay thousands of dollars to be smuggled into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Eric Camacho: United States Border Patrol Agent testifying about smuggling practices and financial transactions involving smugglers
